description:
cgo: enable external linking mode on FreeBSD i386.

Tested on FreeBSD 9.1 i386, per rsc's instructions at
https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-dev/HjRTLvRsJXo/discussion .

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Sorry, I missed this one. Already listed in the file.

Russ

I think this change is not needed. Could you please close/abadon this change, hg change -d 7536044
